segments.text: I glance into this kitchen and everything seems normal at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's focused on drying a plate by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But suddenly, I notice the faucet's running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing—water's spilling over the edge!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle's forming fast on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in it, but she hasn't reacted yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over there, a boy's on a stool reaching the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tipping—oh my, that's dangerous!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate while grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's beside him, arm up, waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking treats without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm compared to this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never expected such chaos in a simple kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
